personal.name: Alejandro Moral Aranda
personal.about: Experienced fund accountant with 3+ years in Private Equity, Private Debt, and Real Estate fund accounting (GLP structures). Expert in NAV calculations, financial statement preparation (IFRS/Luxembourg GAAP), CAS compliance, and complex waterfall calculations. Proven track record automating accounting workflows through VBA and SQL, reducing month-end close time by 40%. Skilled in investor reporting, capital calls/distributions, and managing multi-currency portfolios. Proficient in Python for document automation, SQL for data extraction and validation, and advanced Excel/VBA for complex financial reporting.

workExperience.title: PERE Fund Accountant & Transfer Agency
workExperience.description: Fund Accounting for Private Equity and Real Estate Funds (GLP structures). Responsible for full accounting cycle: trial balance preparation, financial statements (IFRS), NAV calculation, CAS compliance, and capital activity management (calls, distributions, equalizations). Automated monthly reporting processes using VBA macros, reducing preparation time by 45%.

workExperience.title: Private Debt Fund Accountant
workExperience.description: Fund accounting for Permira Debt Funds specializing in subordinated syndicated loans. Managed accounting for complex financial instruments: Syndicated Loans, ITLs, Swaps, Preferred Equity, Bonds, FX Forwards. Prepared financial statements, CAS compliance reports, investor communications. Created automated Excel/VBA tools for loan amortization schedules.

workExperience.title: Wealth Management Internship
workExperience.description: KYC for physical persons, risk profile analysis, AML and management of bank accounts. Accounting support and financial reporting.

workExperience.title: M&A Analyst Internship
workExperience.description: Work in a buy-side mandate in the heating industry. Financial analysis and due diligence support.

workExperience.title: Individual Investor
workExperience.description: Portfolio Management of personal investments. Financial reporting and accounting for investment portfolio.

projects.title: Polymarket / Polygon Trading Client, Utility Library & Terminal
projects.description: Production-grade Python client for Polymarket/Polygon decentralized prediction markets. Implemented REST + WebSocket utilities, order-book adapters, and advanced order management systems. Developed fast execution terminal supporting remote strategy deployment and automated trading with atomic swap integration.

projects.title: Algorithmic Trading
projects.description: Data-driven trading strategy using machine learning. Implemented Leave-One-Out Cross-Validation and k-Nearest Neighbors with asymptotically optimal weights for predicting market open direction and generating trading signals.

projects.title: Research Papers
projects.description: Collection of peer-reviewed research papers on quantitative finance, econometrics, machine learning, and data science applications in financial markets.

projects.title: VBA Automated Reporting Tools
projects.description: Advanced automation tools in VBA for large-scale report generation and data processing. Automating custom reports using templates with intelligent logic and batch processing capabilities.

projects.title: TareaFlow
projects.description: Web-based team management solution with embedded PowerShell server. Includes task tracking, holiday management, and work-from-home tools running locally without installation.

projects.title: MieMieSocks
projects.description: E-commerce platform mockup for online retail. Built with Bootstrap and Node.js demonstrating full-stack web development capabilities.

projects.title: KanjiList.org
projects.description: Educational web platform for learning Japanese kanji. Utilizes web scraping and Python backend for data collection and interactive learning.
